attributes.action: To retract the £1bn DUP deal and use the money across the whole United Kingdom.
attributes.background: The Conservative Party promised £1bn to Northern Ireland as part of a deal to secure a majority government with the Democratic Unionist Party. This deal should be suspended and the £1bn should be spent  across the whole of the UK, not to prop up a Parliamentary majority.
